definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
lit. to steal a rafter and replace it with a column/to replace the original with a fake/to perpetrate a fraud (idiom)
Shizhu Tujia autonomous county in Qianjiang suburbs of Chongqing municipality

sentences.english: Elephant trunk-like dust pillars point towards the hot blue stars and are tell-tale signs of their eroding effect.
sentences.chinese: 指向蓝色热星的象鼻状尘埃柱是辐射侵蚀效果的证据。

sentences.english: The directional signal switch is installed just below the hub of the steering wheel.
sentences.chinese: 转向开关就安装在转向柱毂的下面。

sentences.english: The ball will bound back when it is thrown on the pole.
sentences.chinese: 球抛在柱上会弹回来的。

sentences.english: The first posts are used for electrical connection and are made of copper according to an embodiment.
sentences.chinese: 所述多个第一柱用于电连接且根据实施例由铜制成。

sentences.english: We consider this nucleus as the spinal accessory nucleus of the chicken.
sentences.chinese: 笔者认为此细胞柱应为鸡的副神经核。

sentences.english: The beautiful topiary trees are witnesses of our marriage.
sentences.chinese: 浪漫鲜花柱见证我们的婚盟约誓。

sentences.english: The flexure second-order effect of column in reinforced concrete frame is analysed.
sentences.chinese: 对钢筋混凝土框架柱的纵向挠曲二阶效应做了分析。

sentences.english: Cedar columns flare at their base as they prop up the Douglas fir logs overhead.
sentences.chinese: 雪松柱熠熠生辉地在支撑着上方的花旗松原木。

sentences.english: Transferring the rod having initial bending into the straight rod , its deformation can be com-puted them.
sentences.chinese: 并把具有初弯曲的杆柱转化为直杆柱以求其变形。

sentences.english: The concrete filled steel tube with two main elements was adopted at workshop of hot-rolling slab-yard.
sentences.chinese: 热轧板坯库采用双肢钢管混凝土柱作为厂柱。

sentences.english: The backwashing frequency of bio-ceramic filter is one time per week.
sentences.chinese: 生物陶粒柱的反冲频率为每周一次。

sentences.english: Terrified animals attacks prisoners chained to posts or bound up with fresh meat.
sentences.chinese: 受到惊吓的野兽攻击锁在柱上或绑上鲜肉的囚犯。

sentences.english: S. packed column are suitable to this analysis.
sentences.chinese: 填充柱都能适用于这一分析。

sentences.english: This paper presents the details of investigation of the subsided column by seismic reflected wave method.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了利用反射波地震法探测陷落柱的情况。

sentences.english: The dendriform-column is a new kind of structure of modern constructions.
sentences.chinese: 钢管树状柱是现代建筑工程中一种较新颖的结构形式。

definition: a building/the frame of a building/roof beam/truss
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
